AT.name: SUPER ROBO MOUSE
AT.description: Wir brauchen deine Hilfe! ROBO wurde von bösen BOLTZ CLAN ergriffen und braucht Hilfe, um ihn sicher ans Ziel zu bringen. BEEILE DICH BITTE! • Mehr als 20 Kurse in drei verschiedenen Welten warten auf dich, während du ROBO hilfst zu entkommen. • Viele Hindernisse wie z. B. Sägeblätter, Stacheln, Flammenwerfer, Laser und sogar Haie werden versuchen, dich auf dem Weg aufzuhalten. • Benutze den TV und dasWii U™ GamePad zusammen, um zu ermitteln, wie viele “Titanium Cheese”-Stücke in jeder Phase nötig sind, um ROBO zu retten! • Schöne, handgezeichnete Kunst und exklusive Musik wird dich in 1080p HD von den kreativen Köpfen von BLOK DROP U überwältigen.

movies.name: SUPER ROBO MOUSE: Trailer zum Verkaufsstart

AU.name: SUPER ROBO MOUSE
AU.description: We need your help! ROBO has been captured by the evil BOLTZ CLAN and needs assistance getting him safely to the goal. PLEASE HURRY! • Over 20 courses across 3 different worlds await you as you help ROBO escape. • Many obstacles such as saw blades, spikes, flamethrowers, lasers, and even sharks will try to stop you along the way. • Use the TV and Wii U™ GamePad together to map out how many “Titanium Cheese” pieces are required in each stage to save ROBO! • Beautiful hand-drawn art and exclusive music will dazzle you in 1080p HD from the creative minds of BLOK DROP U.

BG.name: SUPER ROBO MOUSE
BG.description: We need your help! ROBO has been captured by the evil BOLTZ CLAN and needs assistance getting him safely to the goal. PLEASE HURRY! • Over 20 courses across 3 different worlds await you as you help ROBO escape. • Many obstacles such as saw blades, spikes, flamethrowers, lasers, and even sharks will try to stop you along the way. • Use the TV and Wii U™ GamePad together to map out how many “Titanium Cheese” pieces are required in each stage to save ROBO! • Beautiful hand-drawn art and exclusive music will dazzle you in 1080p HD from the creative minds of BLOK DROP U.

BE.name: SUPER ROBO MOUSE
BE.description: Nous avons besoin de votre aide ! ROBO a été capturé par le méchant BOLTZ CLAN et a besoin d'aide pour l'emmener en toute sécurité à l'objectif. DÉPÊCHEZ-VOUS S'IL VOUS PLAÎT ! • Plus de 20 parcours à travers trois mondes différents vous attendent lorsque vous aidez ROBO à s'échapper. • De nombreux obstacles tels que des lames de scie, des pointes, des lance-flammes, des lasers, et même des requins essaieront de vous arrêter en chemin. • Utilisez la TV et la Wii U™ GamePad ensemble pour planifier le nombre de morceaux de « fromage en titane » nécessaires à chaque étape pour sauver ROBO ! • Les beaux graphismes dessinés à la main et la musique exclusive vous éblouiront en 1080p HD à partir des esprits créatifs de BLOK DROP U.

movies.name: SUPER ROBO MOUSE : bande-annonce de lancement

ES.name: SUPER ROBO MOUSE
ES.description: ¡Necesitamos tu ayuda! ROBO ha sido capturado por el malvado BOLTZ CLAN y necesita ayuda para llegar con seguridad al objetivo. ¡POR FAVOR, DATE PRISA! • Te esperan más de 20 carreras en 3 mundos diferentes mientras ayudas a ROBO a escapar. • Muchos obstáculos, como espadas, lanzas, lanzallamas, rayos láser e incluso tiburones intentarán detenerte en el camino. • ¡Usa la TV y el Wii U™ GamePad conjuntamente para saber cuantas piezas de "Queso de Titanio" se necesitan en cada fase para salvar a ROBO! • Los hermosos diseños dibujados a mano y la música exclusiva de las mentes creativas de BLOK DROP U te deslumbrarán en 1080p HD.

movies.name: SUPER ROBO MOUSE: Tráiler de lanzamiento

IT.name: SUPER ROBO MOUSE
IT.description: Abbiamo bisogno del tuo aiuto! ROBO è stato catturato dal malvagio BOLTZ CLAN e ha bisogno d'aiuto per arrivare sano e salvo all'obiettivo. TI PREGO, SBRIGATI! • Oltre 20 percorsi su 3 mondi diversi ti aspettano mentre aiuti ROBO a scappare. • Numerosi ostacoli quali lame circolari, spuntoni, lanciafiamme, laser e perfino squali proveranno a fermarti lungo la strada. • Usa sia la TV che il Wii U™ GamePad per scoprire quanti pezzi di "Formaggi di Titanio" sono necessari in ogni livello per salvare ROBO! • Bellissime grafiche disegnate a mano e musiche esclusive ti incanteranno in 1080p HD, dalle menti creative di BLOK DROP U.

movies.name: SUPER ROBO MOUSE: trailer di lancio

NL.name: SUPER ROBO MOUSE
NL.description: We hebben jouw hulp nodig! ROBO is gevangen genomen door de kwaadaardige BOLTZ CLAN en heeft hulp nodig om hem veilig naar het doel te krijgen. WEES SNEL! - Meer dan 20 routes door 3 verschillende werelden wachten op jou om ROBO te helpen ontsnappen. - Veel obstakels zoals zaagbladen, spikes, vlammenwerpers, lasers en zelfs haaien zullen je onderweg proberen te stoppen. - Gebruik de TV en Wii U™ GamePad samen om uit te vinden hoeveel 'Titanium Kaas'-stukken er nodig zijn in elk stadium om ROBO te redden! - Prachtige handgetekende kunst en exclusieve muziek zullen jou verbijsteren in 1080p HD, van de creatieve geesten van BLOK DROP U.

NZ.name: SUPER ROBO MOUSE
NZ.description: We need your help! ROBO has been captured by the evil BOLTZ CLAN and needs assistance getting him safely to the goal. PLEASE HURRY! • Over 20 courses across 3 different worlds await you as you help ROBO escape. • Many obstacles such as saw blades, spikes, flamethrowers, lasers, and even sharks will try to stop you along the way. • Use the TV and Wii U™ GamePad together to map out how many “Titanium Cheese” pieces are required in each stage to save ROBO! • Beautiful hand-drawn art and exclusive music will dazzle you in 1080p HD from the creative minds of BLOK DROP U.

PT.name: SUPER ROBO MOUSE
PT.description: Precisamos da tua ajuda! O ROBO foi capturado pelo malvado BOLTZ CLAN e precisa de ajuda para chegar em segurança ao objetivo. POR FAVOR, DESPACHA-TE! • Mais de 20 percursos através de três mundos diferentes esperam-te enquanto ajudas o ROBO a escapar. • Muitos obstáculos, tais como lâminas de serra, pregos, lança-chamas, lasers e até tubarões vão tentar parar-te pelo caminho. • Usa a TV juntamente com o Wii U™ GamePad para mapear quantos peças de "Queijo de Titânio"são necessárias em cada nível para salvar o ROBO! • Arte belíssima desenhada à mão e música exclusiva vão fascinar-te em 1080p HD, das mentes criativas de BLOK DROP U.

movies.name: SUPER ROBO MOUSE: Trailer de lançamento

RU.name: SUPER ROBO MOUSE
RU.description: Нам нужна ваша помощь! ROBO был схвачен злым BOLTZ CLAN и нуждается в вашей помощи, чтобы достичь своей цели. ПОТОРОПИТЕСЬ! • Более 20 путей по 3 разным мирам ожидают вас во время спасения ROBO. • Множество препятствий, таких как пилы, копья, огнеметы, лазеры и даже акулы, попытаются остановить вас. • Используйте TV и Wii U™ GamePad вместе, чтобы понять, сколько кусочков "Титанового сыра" нужны на каждом уровне, чтобы спасти ROBO! • Красивейшие рисунки и эксклюзивная музыка поразят вас в 1080p HD, созданном творцами из BLOK DROP U.

movies.name: SUPER ROBO MOUSE: трейлер, посвященный выходу игры
